transArray.content: The price in Beijing is already very good

Dear guest, thank you for choosing to stay at Orange Beijing Wukesong Hotel and leaving your review and feedback. The hotel price may fluctuate due to different market traffic in the surrounding area. The hotel is located on the West Fourth Ring Auxiliary Road, with convenient transportation in all directions. Specifically, Line 6, Haidian 5th Road It only takes five minutes to walk from Ju Station. It has an excellent location and is cost-effective. Thank you for your recognition. We look forward to your visit every time. If you have any questions during your stay, you can contact our staff at any time and we will provide you with prompt information. We provide dedicated service and look forward to your full recommendation! I wish you all the best!
